title.narrative: Introduction of an Environmentally Sound Management and Disposal System for PCBs wastes and PCB-contaminated Equipment- in Indonesia (PIF)

description.narrative: The project aims to (a) introduce and implement a PCB management system to reduce and/or eliminate releases from PCB wastes stockpiles and PCB-containing equipment and (b) dispose of at least 3,000 tones of PCBs wastes and PCB-containing equipment in an environmentally-sound manner maximizing opportunities for public-private partnership.
